definition: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: A breeze sprang up and stirred her short hair, which was certainly whiter than the previous year.
sentences.chinese: 微風起來，吹動他短髮，確乎比去年白得多了。

sentences.english: This is very difficult indeed be seen or thought of the scene.
sentences.chinese: 這確乎是很難見過或想到的場景。

sentences.english: Nankai can smoothly carry out frontier research projects, to indeed be a luck.
sentences.chinese: 南開能夠順利開展邊疆研究計劃，確乎是個機緣。

sentences.english: A breeze came to her and touched her short hair, which seemed more grey than last year.
sentences.chinese: 微風起來，吹動她的短髮，確乎比去年白得多了。
